l: The How to Earn page will extend and explain the whole buy offer, and rewarding the owners concept.
The higher your buy offer, the more you own the saNFT network, the more you earn.
This will bring interesting developings, also from a trading perspective: read more in the next page.

But all the things that happen on our platform are completely transparent to the artists and the users. In fact, you could just query the data to the Stellar Horizon API and see what's happening: whatever happens, you'll know exactly what it is.
